name: Fox Run (Marcelo Fardo)
description:
Just a simple endless runner game I made for my classes in game dev in University of Caxias do Sul.

Made with Unity and Bolt (not a single line of code was wrote).

Can you make 10.000 points?

Sprites: Sunny Land - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/sunny-land-103349

Menu song: Rhythm of Wind, Sky, and Earth - Chronno Trigger OST

Game song - Endless Runner by Ok3anos - https://soundcloud.com/ok3anos/endless-runner

Death SFX: Super Mario World Mario Death :)

Unfortunately, I couldn't make it run on WebGL. It seems to be some bug with the WebGL build and Bolt. So I could only deliver in an Windowns .exe.
